      • retrieveSetFolderPermission

        public ArrayList<AccessPermission> retrieveSetFolderPermission(Folder folder,
                                                      boolean includePublic)
        Retrieves permissions that have been explicitly set for the folders with the exception of the public read permission if specified in the parameter. The call for that is a separate method
        Parameters:
        folder - folder whose permissions are being retrieved
        includePublic - whether to include public access if set
        Returns:
        list of permissions that have been found for the specified folder

      • propagateFolderPermissions

        public boolean propagateFolderPermissions(Account account,
                                 Folder folder,
                                 boolean add)
        Propagates the permissions for the folder to the contained entries
        Parameters:
        account - account of user requesting action that led to this call
        folder - folder user permissions are being propagated
        add - true if folder is to be added, false otherwise
        Returns:
        true if action permission was propagated successfully

      • setEntryPermissions

        public PartData setEntryPermissions(String userId,
                           long partId,
                           ArrayList<AccessPermission> permissions)
        Sets permissions for the part identified by the part id. If the part does not exist, then a new one is created and permissions assigned. This method clears all existing permissions and sets the specified ones
        Parameters:
        userId - unique identifier for user creating permissions. Must have write privileges on the entry if one exists
        partId - unique identifier for the part. If a part with this identifier is not located, then one is created
        permissions - list of permissions to set for the part. Null or empty list will clear all permissions
        Returns:
        part whose permissions have been set. At a minimum it contains the unique identifier for the part

      • setFolderPermissions

        public FolderDetails setFolderPermissions(String userId,
                                 long folderId,
                                 ArrayList<AccessPermission> permissions)

      • createPermission

        public AccessPermission createPermission(String userId,
                                long partId,
                                AccessPermission access)
        Adds a new permission to the specified entry. If the entry does not exist, a new one is created
        Parameters:
        userId - unique identifier for user creating the permission. Must have write privileges on the entry if one exists
        partId - unique identifier for the part. If a part with this identifier is not located, then one is created
        access - permissions to be added to the entry
        Returns:
        created permission if successful, null otherwise

      • removeEntryPermission

        public void removeEntryPermission(String userId,
                         long partId,
                         long permissionId)
